burnBnt().details: Allows user or dao to burn BNT

claimBnt(uint256).details: Allows user to claim BNT for pools contract. User must wait 24 hours for BNT to unlock, after can call and receive.

claimUserBnt(uint256).details: Allows user to claim BNT. User must wait 24 hours for BNT to unlock, then call claimBnt before claiming

fund(uint256,uint256).details: Allows user or dao to fund IL protection and/or staking rewards

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

set(uint256,uint256).details: Allows owner to set pool allocation point

setDappPerBlock(uint256).details: Allows owner to set DAPP token rewards issued per block

stakeDapp(uint256,uint256).details: Allows user to single sided stake DAPP tokens

stakeDappBnt(uint256,uint256).details: if there is no more bnt for single sided staking, users can still stake dapp-bnt tokens

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unstakeDapp(uint256).details: Allows user to unstake single sided staked DAPP tokens

unstakeDappBnt(uint256,uint256).details: Returns DAPPBNT LP tokens to user
